members.name: cloudflarePagesAdapter
members.content:
```typescript export declare function cloudflarePagesAdapter(opts?: CloudflarePagesAdapterOptions): any; ```
Parameter Type Description
opts [CloudflarePagesAdapterOptions](#cloudflarepagesadapteroptions) _(Optional)_
**Returns:** any

members.name: CloudflarePagesAdapterOptions
members.content:
```typescript export interface CloudflarePagesAdapterOptions extends ServerAdapterOptions ``` **Extends:** ServerAdapterOptions
Property Modifiers Type Description
[functionRoutes?](./router.cloudflarepagesadapteroptions.functionroutes.md) boolean _(Optional)_ Determines if the build should generate the function invocation routes `_routes.json` file. https://developers.cloudflare.com/pages/platform/functions/routing/\#functions-invocation-routes Defaults to `true`.
[staticPaths?](./router.cloudflarepagesadapteroptions.staticpaths.md) string\[\] _(Optional)_ Manually add pathnames that should be treated as static paths and not SSR. For example, when these pathnames are requested, their response should come from a static file, rather than a server-side rendered response.
